attributes.review: I wanted to learn more about our president so I downloaded this. Here is my problem though. As soon as I got it I kept getting random  notifications! I was weirded out by this. A few days later my phone started dying quicker then usual, and it shut down. Then when I went back on the app deleted itself. I am horrified
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: If I could give this app a rating I rated give it a zero star, this is the worst thing I have seen in this living earth oh no no no no the plans are the worst and let me tell you what president does this but whatever this is the worst app ever don’t even take your time to download it unless you’re trying to be a Karen and actually support this clown🤡
attributes.title: Gave me nightmares ✨

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded in my life. It’s glitchy as hell, nothing was able to open, and every time I tried to press a button it made a fart sound. When I opened the app, an image of some wrinkly orange bridge troll popped up that was so hideous it made my eyeballs throw up. This app is an insult to the Apple store and should be taken down immediately!!!
attributes.title: Tremendously bad app

attributes.review: not only is this app a tirade to American values, trump has never paid attention to anything valuable in his life. Which made me question, how could he have coded an app? Much less run a country right? His lack of work ethic and overwhelming racism makes it clear that he is merely a lizard person hiding in a persons body, you can tell because his wig always flies off when his lizard eyes dilate!
attributes.title: DISGUSTING HORRIBLE DISGRACEFUL

attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible. after downloading (which took three whole days) I woke up to see a strange orange man in the middle of my room at night. his face seemed to have somewhat of an orange complexion. I was scared and started to cry and begged him to leave but then he killed my pet beaver and kicked me in the stomach. then he called me a monkey, stole all of my money, and left. i do not recommend ‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!

attributes.review: I got this app hoping to support the great president 🍊orange 🍊and it was working but after about an hour of browsing the app and looking at the ✨ Oompa Loompa ✨I started to notice everything I look at having like a slight orange tint to it. And now I’m freaking out and possibly have to go to the hospital. So thank you for ruining my life. ✨ you will be receiving my medical bills ✨
attributes.title: Turned everything orange????

attributes.review: this app took months to download. It broke my entire phone. The only time I actually got on the app I saw a scary orange man that caused me to get off the app right away and delete it. This app took up all the storage on my phone and deleted all my other apps and was awful. I wish I could rate this app 0 stars but I guess 1 star will do for now. (Not really tho)
attributes.title: orange scary man

attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app to praise our wonderful president Donald Trump, but when I downloaded it, it started to crash my phone. Every time I open it, It would crash. 

Now what was even more strange was that I started seeing Trump as my wallpaper on my phone. I didn’t put it there, and every time I tried to change it it wouldn’t 👏let 👏me👏.

I tried rebooting my phone and everything, he was still there. In every app he was still there. I didn’t want to delete the app, because I wanted to praise our ✨lord and savior ✨. But having Trump take over my phone? No thanks. So I deleted it. 

I expected better 😤😤😤
attributes.title: AMERICAN HORROR STORY!!!

attributes.review: dude this app is the worst app i could have ever encountered!! took almost 9 days to even download and once it downloaded i clicked on it and BOOM the app had vanished from my phone right before my eyes. i was almost upset that i had to set my eyes on the rapist we call out president, but thank god the app did me justice and deleted before i had to see anything
attributes.title: trump orange as

attributes.review:
right when i downloaded this app i was met with very disturbing and displeasing images that caused me to projectile vomit on my cat. thankfully she’s a hybrid between mouse and squirrel so she didn’t start sneezing frosted flakes on the floor, but it could have been VERY deadly and i would’ve lost EVERYTHING. 

i am baffled how the trump administration would let such vile pictures be shown and cause such discomfort. because of this i have gone BLIND in my ears and DEAF in my mouth. 1/5 STARS!!! 
NEVER DOWNLOAD!! WILL IMPLANT WORMS IN YOU BRAINS!!!
